messages.subject: Portland playgroup?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I m new to this list, and also new to the Portland (Oregon) area.  I m wondering if there exists a playgroup for younger children--mine is 13 months, and
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I'm new to this list, and also new to the Portland (Oregon) area. I'm wondering if there exists a playgroup for younger children--mine is 13 months, and right now there are no kids around for him to play with. I'm really inspired by the unschooling philosophy and I hope my son will be too! Are there any playgroups for this age group already formed, or is anyone interested in starting one with us?

Please write me at djunapearl@...

Cathy
